TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TtsEngineSsml extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有的语音合成引擎文字可实现的抽象基类。

span.span: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要构造一个自定义文本到语音转换引擎，应用程序必须始终实现派生自抽象基类的类。To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class . 正确注册的实现然后可用作通过合成语音命名空间基于应用程序。A properly registered implementation of can then be used as a synthesizer voice by name space based applications. 对象继承自必须重写以下成员： ， ， ，和。Objects inheriting from must override the following members: , , , and . 最重要的成员类实现是方法。The most important member of the class to be implemented is the method. 方法由基础结构文本分析器接收调用：The method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1. 对引用接口，从而提供对系统服务，如甚至队列以及编写音频输出的访问。A reference to the interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output. 2. 数组实例生成语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 输入中。An array of instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input. 除了要呈现为语音的文本，分析的 SSML 存储有关请求的属性的信息中的语音与每个传入关联实例对象。In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a instance associated with each incoming object. 语音合成器应用程序 （可选） 可以通过实现发出指定的输出格式的请求时它将尝试提供正确的音频输出平台调用。A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output. 实施者还可以用于管理其实现的外部定义的发音或词典，提供支持和。An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string registryKey) cil managed

param.name: registryKey
param.span: 与 实现相关的语音标记的注册表项的全名。

span.span: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the implementation.
engine.

summary.span: 基于相应的语音标记注册表项构建新的 实例。

span.span: Constructs a new instance of based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数通常都由基于选择合成语音的应用程序要使用的实例。Calls to this constructor are typically generated by based applications selecting a synthesizer voice to be used by an instance of . A必须是下 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens 寄存器。A must be register under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddLexicon (Uri uri, string mediaType, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddLexicon(class System.Uri uri, string mediaType, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site) cil managed
public: abstract void AddLexicon(Uri ^ uri, System::String ^ mediaType, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::ITtsEngineSite ^ site);

param.name: uri
param.span: 指示词典信息位置的 的有效实例。

span.span: A valid instance of indicating the location of the lexicon information.

param.name: mediaType
param.span: 一个包含该词典的媒体类型的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.

param.span: 媒体类型要区分大小写。

span.span: Media types are case insensitive.

param.name: site
param.span: 对用于与平台基础结构进行交互的 接口的引。

span.span: A reference to an interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.

summary.span: 添加词典到当前 实例实现的 。

span.span: Adds a lexicon to the implemented by the current instance.

para.span: 要完全熟悉并能够处理存储在词典的实现负责。

span.span: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at .

para.span: 实现还必须跟踪和管理，它将添加的所有词典的生存期。

span.span: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it adds.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract IntPtr GetOutputFormat (System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat speakOutputFormat, IntPtr targetWaveFormat);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int GetOutputFormat(valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat speakOutputFormat, native int targetWaveFormat) cil managed
public: abstract IntPtr GetOutputFormat(System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::SpeakOutputFormat speakOutputFormat, IntPtr targetWaveFormat);

param.name: speakOutputFormat
param.span: 指示请求的音频输出格式的类型 枚举的有效成员。

span.span: Valid member of the enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.

param.name: targetWaveFormat
param.span: 指向音频格式类型中包含由 speakOutputFormat 参数请求的详细信息设置的 的指针。

span.span: A pointer to a containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the speakOutputFormat argument.

summary.span: 返回对向合成器引擎请求支持特定输出格式的给定合成引擎响应支持的最佳匹配音频输出。

span.span: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.

returns.span: 返回引用包含有关输出格式的详细信息 的有效 实例。

span.span: Returns a valid instance referring to a containing detailed information about the output format.

para.span: 对象继承自应检查按照指定的请求的输出格式并返回它所支持的最接近格式。

span.span: Object inheriting from should examine the requested output format as specified by and return the closest format that it supports.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void RemoveLexicon (Uri uri, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site);

param.name: uri
param.span: 指示词典信息位置的 的有效实例。

span.span: A valid instance of indicating the location of the lexicon information.

param.name: site
param.span: 对由平台基础结构传入以允许访问基础结构资源的 接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.

summary.span: 移除由当前 实例实现的 当前加载的字典。

span.span: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the implemented by the current instance.

para.span: 要完全熟悉并能够处理存储在词典的实现负责。

span.span: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at .

para.span: 实现还必须跟踪和管理它会删除所有词典的生存期。

span.span: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it removes.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Speak (System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[] fragment, IntPtr waveHeader, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Speak(class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[] fragment, native int waveHeader, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite site) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Speak (fragment As TextFragment(), waveHeader As IntPtr, site As ITtsEngineSite)
public: abstract void Speak(cli::array <System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::TextFragment ^> ^ fragment, IntPtr waveHeader, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::ITtsEngineSite ^ site);

param.name: fragment
param.span: 包含呈现在语音中的文本的 实例数组。

span.span: An array of instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.

param.name: waveHeader
param.span: 指向包含音频输出格式结构的 。

span.span: An pointing to a structure containing audio output format.

param.name: site
param.span: 对由平台基础结构传入以允许访问基础结构资源的 接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.

summary.span: 在指定的输出格式呈现指定的 数组。

span.span: Renders specified array in the specified output format.

block.para:
自定义语音合成器实现使用和工作作为筛选器或使用平台基础结构的成员通过构造的合成器应用程序之间的中介命名空间和基础系统语音合成引擎。Custom speech synthesizer implements using and work as filters or intermediaries between synthesizer applications constructed using the platform infrastructure through the members of the namespace and underlying system speech synthesis engines.
A实现：A implementation:
1. 捕获或修改的传入方面对象Traps or modify aspects of the incoming objects
2. 生成任何所需的事件使用的站点引用实例Generates any necessary events using the site reference to a instance
3. 生成实际的合成的语音。Generates the actual synthesized speech.
生成语音最通常是通过调用说话呈现引擎由操作系统提供的语音之一上。Generation of speech is most typically done by calling Speak on one of the speech rendering engines provided by the operating system.
如果用语音呈现引擎之一未使用，一个对象，该对象从继承必须创建自己的语音呈现引擎。If one of the available speech rendering engines is not used, a object inheriting from must create its own speech rendering engine.
访问说话获得使用注册表和反射的方法。Access to the Speak method on obtained using the registry and reflection. ..
继承自，必须重写以下成员： ， ， ， ，和。When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , and .
